notes_display: Corroded, obv./rev. blind spot; rev. double struck
issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Ardashir III on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown with three mural elements, crown cap,  above wing to the left and right; no dot above crown cap, at the top crescent and covered korymbos; double pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing to the left and right behind the shoulders, pointing upwards; earing consisting of three elements; neck-line of tunica edged with row of pearls; circular ornament in the middle; crescent on left shoulder; both shoulders decorated with crescent and star; double row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast,  breast decorated with three ellipsoid objects with a dot above each element; star in upper left and right field; crescent and star at 3 h, 6 h and 9 h; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 2 h l. i. ’rthštr; 11 h l. o. ’pzwn’|Ardašīr abzōn| “Ardashir, increase”
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of three elements, altar shaft, to the left and the right of the shaft ribbons hanging downwards; four altar slabs; altar flames rendered as four tiers of four, three, two and one strokes respectively; star to left of altar flames, crescent to the right; to the left and the right of the altar attendant with stylized crown of Ardashir III, holding sword with both hands, right hand above left hand, both figures frontal; regnal year at 9 h; ; crescent at 3 h, 6 h 9 h and 12 h; dotted border
